vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Exo.6.21;
son of: Izhar (H3324);
brother of: Korah (H7141I), Nepheg (H5298) and Shelomith (H8019A)
§ Zichri = "memorable"
1) the father of Eliezer, the chief of the Reubenites in the reign of David
2) the father of Amasiah, a descendant of Judah
3) a son of Izhar and grandson of Kohath
4) a descendant of Eliezer the son of Moses
5) a son of Asaph, elsewhere called 'Zabdi' and 'Zaccur'
6) a priest of the family of Abijah, in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua
7) a descendant of Benjamin of the sons of Shimhi
8) a descendant of Benjamin of the sons of Shashak
9) a descendant of Benjamin of the sons of Jeroham
10) father of Joel and descendant of Benjamin
11) a father of Elishaphat, one of the conspirators with Jehoiada
12) a Ephraimite hero in the invading army of Pekah the son of Remaliah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) זַכּוּר ,זַבְדִּי   varios hombres; (b)   hijo de Simí; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín; (c)   hijo de Sasac; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín; (d)   hijo de Jeroham; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín; (e) זַכּוּר ,זַבְדִּי   hijo de Asaf; ancestro de Matanías, levita; (f)   hijo de Joram; tribu de Leví; (g)   padre de Eliézer, jefe; tribu de Rubén; en tiempos de David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
細基利 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "值得紀念的"
1) 大衛王時負責管理流便人的以利以謝的父親 (代上 27:16)
2) 亞瑪斯雅的父親, 猶大的子孫(代下 17:16)
3) 以斯哈的兒子, 哥轄的孫子(出 6:21)
4) 摩西的兒子以利以謝的一個後裔(代上 26:25)
5) 亞薩的後代 (代上 9:12), 別處稱作 '撒底'[2067] 和 '撒刻'[2139]
6) 在耶書亞的兒子約雅金的時代, 一位亞比雅族的祭司(尼 12:17)
7) 便雅憫人示每的一名子孫 (代上 8:19)
8) 便雅憫人沙煞的一名子孫 (代上 8:23)
9) 便雅憫人耶羅罕的子孫 (代上 8:27)
10) 便雅憫人約珥的父親(尼 11:9)
11) 以利沙法的父親, 以利沙法是和耶何耶大共謀復辟的人之一(代下 23:1)
12) 在利瑪利的兒子比加入侵猶大時的一名以法蓮的勇士 (代下 28:7)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
细基利 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "值得纪念的"
1) 大卫王时负责管理流便人的以利以谢的父亲 (代上 27:16)
2) 亚玛斯雅的父亲, 犹大的子孙(代下 17:16)
3) 以斯哈的儿子, 哥辖的孙子(出 6:21)
4) 摩西的儿子以利以谢的一个后裔(代上 26:25)
5) 亚萨的后代 (代上 9:12), 别处称作 '撒底'[2067] 和 '撒刻'[2139]
6) 在耶书亚的儿子约雅金的时代, 一位亚比雅族的祭司(尼 12:17)
7) 便雅悯人示每的一名子孙 (代上 8:19)
8) 便雅悯人沙煞的一名子孙 (代上 8:23)
9) 便雅悯人耶罗罕的子孙 (代上 8:27)
10) 便雅悯人约珥的父亲(尼 11:9)
11) 以利沙法的父亲, 以利沙法是和耶何耶大共谋复辟的人之一(代下 23:1)
12) 在利玛利的儿子比加入侵犹大时的一名以法莲的勇士 (代下 28:7)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.19;
son of: Shimei (H8096N);
brother of: Jakim (H3356), Zabdi (H2067H), Elienai (H0462), Zillethai (H6769), Eliel (H0447H), Adaiah (H5718H), Beraiah (H1256) and Shimrath (H8119)
§ Zichri = "memorable"
1) the father of Eliezer, the chief of the Reubenites in the reign of David
2) the father of Amasiah, a descendant of Judah
3) a son of Izhar and grandson of Kohath
4) a descendant of Eliezer the son of Moses
5) a son of Asaph, elsewhere called 'Zabdi' and 'Zaccur'
6) a priest of the family of Abijah, in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua
7) a descendant of Benjamin of the sons of Shimhi
8) a descendant of Benjamin of the sons of Shashak
9) a descendant of Benjamin of the sons of Jeroham
10) father of Joel and descendant of Benjamin
11) a father of Elishaphat, one of the conspirators with Jehoiada
12) a Ephraimite hero in the invading army of Pekah the son of Remaliah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.15;
son of: Asaph (H0623I);
father of: Mica (H4316); also called Zabdi at Neh.11.17;
Also named: zav.di (זַבְדִּי "Zabdi" H2067J)
§ Zichri = "memorable"
1) the father of Eliezer, the chief of the Reubenites in the reign of David
2) the father of Amasiah, a descendant of Judah
3) a son of Izhar and grandson of Kohath
4) a descendant of Eliezer the son of Moses
5) a son of Asaph, elsewhere called 'Zabdi' and 'Zaccur'
6) a priest of the family of Abijah, in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua
7) a descendant of Benjamin of the sons of Shimhi
8) a descendant of Benjamin of the sons of Shashak
9) a descendant of Benjamin of the sons of Jeroham
10) father of Joel and descendant of Benjamin
11) a father of Elishaphat, one of the conspirators with Jehoiada
12) a Ephraimite hero in the invading army of Pekah the son of Remaliah
